TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, everything you know and love collapses into your gravity well.

I wish I could get in better shape just by watching workout videos.

granted, you become so buff your heart explodes

i wish i could control gravity

Granted, the point-masses you produce to control gravity break down physics so Hawking gets up and kick you in the shins.

I wish for a cheeseburger.

Granted, it's a tofu-burger with vegan "cheese".

I wish for an unlimited gift card at Costco.

Granted. You are forced to purchase gifts for the gift card. They're not free. Also, you have to purchase gifts for him forever.

I wish for pseudo internet users that mysteriously appear out of nowhere and act very similarly to normal internet users, and can be summoned to a site such as a server or webpage

granted, you dont know which are the pseudo and which are real

i wish that the sun was a hyper-velocity star

Granted. It's also colinear with 30 stars and will crash into every single one within 50 years.

I wish for humans.

Granted. They go broke and can't afford to send the last 3 people back, so they die. Too bad you were chosen to go there...

I wish I was the best footballz.

Totally worth it... as for the last wish granted but they kill you in your sleep.

I wish for everyone here to realise that if a wish is a true wish who wished it would suffer any consequence to get to have the wish granted.

Granted, but the humans take over the world and kill you.

I wish for the founder of EA to burn slowly in a tub of magma BEFORE HE FOUNDED EA! (Because, come on, who dosen't?)

The Wishmaking Fairy is the founder of EA. He bops you on the head and you go *poof*.

I wish I posted on page 666.

Granted, but this breaks the chain of wishes resulting in a paradox in which I un-able to grant the wish because it is on page 666 and not on page 676, meaning that that post could not go on page 666 and therefore must go on page 676, allowing me to grant it...

I wish this paradox could be resolved with minimal headaches.

granted, your brain melts instead of you having headaches

I wish earth was a brown dwarf star

Granted. Now everyone is dead, including you. Happy now?

I wish everyone had a copy of KSP.

Granted. Everyone was executed for pirating KSP.

I wish TPT meant something.

Granted TPT literally means "Something".

I wish for a clear definition of what can and what can not be wished for.

Granted. Nothing further can be wished for.

I cannot complete the second line of my post due to the first line. I wish I could. Oh, wait...

granted, it was a horrible wish that resulted in the death of the universe

i wish that valve renounced being unable to count to three

Granted. Half-Life 3, Portal 3, and Team Fortress 3 are all terrible games with no sci-fi, underpowered weapons, and horrible slime creatures twice as big as men.

I wish horrible slime creatures twice as big as men were in TF2 as NPC's that spawn randomly.

Granted, they are indestructible and spawn camp both teams constantly.

I wish that people would stop listening to horrible music (my definition of horrible music).

Granted. The world is now deaf.

I wish for this wish to not be granted.

granted, but because you wanted it to be not granted youre stuck in a paradox loop

i wish poland would be GMT +0 instead GMT +1

Granted, but the sudden change in timezones bring mass hysteria and panic, causing society as we know it to break down.

I wish for less leftover assignments in school.

Granted. You never qualify anything. Ever.

I wish that man has colonised the moon, to an extent that it looks like a miniature earth, atmosphere and all.

Granted. The atmosphere is made of pure arsenic. Too bad you were sent to test it out...

I wish for a hoarse horse.

granted, due to having a deadly disease that caused its voice to be hoarse, it suddenly dies and falls over you, crushing you to death

i wish that the more people were interested in science
